Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Prohibits online sweepstakes games and revenue from illegal markets
Summary: Prohibits online sweepstakes games and revenue from illegal markets; sets penalties; provides for enforcement of provisions.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting online sweepstakes games and revenue from illegal markets
